summary: This is an email chain between U.S. Attorney's Office personnel regarding an update on a human trafficking subject referral concerning Leon Black. It discusses deconflicting with another agency, interviews with a victim, and communication with attorney Jeanne Christensen.

persons.name: Jeanne Christensen
persons.context: Attorney with whom information about the Leon Black human trafficking referral is being communicated.

persons.name: Leon Black
persons.context: The individual who is the subject of an additional human trafficking (HT) subject referral being discussed by prosecutors.

connections.description: Jeanne Christensen is an attorney being communicated with regarding the investigation into Leon Black.

events.title: Referral Update Communication
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney relays information about the Leon Black human trafficking referral to attorney Jeanne Christensen and notes deconfliction with another agency.

events.title: Interview Read-out
events.description: A prosecutor gets a read-out of interviews conducted with a victim related to the Leon Black human trafficking referral.

keyFacts: The document is a 2023 email chain concerning an active investigation into Leon Black for a potential human trafficking (HT) offense.
Prosecutors are deconflicting with another agency regarding the investigation.
Interviews have been conducted with a victim, and a read-out of those interviews was obtained.
Communication is occurring with attorney Jeanne Christensen regarding the case.
